ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Chronic Otitis Media Sequelae (Left Ear)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: History of chronic ear infections and multiple surgeries in childhood and young adulthood.

ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Soft Tissue Stenosis (Left Ear)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Documented in ENT report and history; sequela of chronic disease and surgery.

ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Mixed Hearing Loss (Left Ear)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Audiometric findings show air-bone gaps and elevated bone conduction thresholds in the high frequencies.

ordered_list.rationale_short: To assess hearing sensitivity and determine the type and degree of hearing loss.
To assess speech reception thresholds and word recognition abilities.
To assess middle ear function, though deferred in this case due to surgical history.

expected_interpretations_by_visit.collective_interpretation: The right ear demonstrates normal hearing sensitivity and speech recognition. The left ear exhibits a mild conductive hearing loss in the low frequencies sloping to a moderate-to-severe mixed hearing loss in the high frequencies, with significant air-bone gaps. Speech recognition in the left ear remains excellent despite the mixed loss. Immittance was not performed due to the history of otosurgery.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Right ear: Normal hearing (0-10 dB HL). Left ear: Mild conductive loss (250-2000 Hz) sloping to moderate-to-severe mixed loss (3000-8000 Hz) with significant air-bone gaps.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: SRT: Right 5 dB HL, Left 30 dB HL (consistent with PTAs). WRS: Right 96-100%, Left 100% at 75 dB HL.

tests.name: Tympanometry
tests.result_summary: Not measured due to previous otosurgery.

proposed_items: Hearing aid evaluation for new technology
Annual hearing test to monitor stability
Semiannual otologist visits for cerumen removal and ear canal monitoring
counseling_actions: Review of audiometric results showing mixed loss in the left ear
Encouragement to schedule hearing aid evaluation

escalation.rationale_short: Scheduled follow-up in 6 months for cerumen removal and monitoring of soft tissue stenosis.

follow_up_plan.objective: Monitor ear canal status (stenosis/cerumen) and hearing sensitivity stability.
